p: The soybeans (Qindou 8#, 85(6)‐5‐1‐1) of different germination stage were purchased from a local market in Shaanxi Province of China. MTT (purity ≥98%) and benzo[α]pyrene (purity ≥96%) were obtained from Sigma (St. Louis, MO, USA). DCFH‐DA was obtained from BestBio Co. (Shanghai, China). BCA protein kit and other cell culture reagents were purchased from Thermo Fisher (Shanghai, China). All of the other chemicals were made in China and were of the highest available grade.
